OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients first randomize one two induction treatment arm . - Induction Arm I : Patients receive 2 course cytarabine IV push every 12 hour day 1-10 1-8 ( 20 16 dos ) ; daunorubicin IV 6 hour day 1 , 3 , 5 ; etoposide IV 4 hour day 1-5 ( 5 dos ) . - Induction Arm II : Patients receive 2 course mitoxantrone IV 6 hour day 1 , 3 , 5 ; cytarabine IV push every 12 hour day 1-10 1-8 ( 20 16 dos ) ; etoposide IV 4 hour day 1-5 ( 5 dos ) . Patients CNS disease diagnosis receive 3 course triple intrathecal therapy ( methotrexate , cytarabine , hydrocortisone ) , one first 3 course chemotherapy . Patients CNS disease receive least 6 course intrathecal therapy ( 2 course per week ) , monthly course final course chemotherapy complete . Patients complete response induction course 2 continue study . Patients complete response induction course 2 take study eligible current Medical Research Council ( MRC ) refractory/relapse study another therapy . Course 3 : All patient continue study receive amsacrine IV 1 hour daily day 1-5 , cytarabine continuous IV infusion daily day 1-5 , etoposide IV 4 hour day 1-5 course 3 . After course 3 , patient assign two risk group : good risk patient , standard poor risk patient . Standard poor risk patient match sibling donor good risk patient randomized consolidation arm I II . - Arm I : Patients receive mitoxantrone IV 6 hour day 1-5 cytarabine IV 2 hour every 12 hour day 1-3 ( 4 course chemotherapy total ) . - Arm II : Patients receive cytarabine IV 3 hour every 12 hour day 1 , 2 , 8 , 9 , asparaginase subcutaneous infusion 3 hour completion last cytarabine dos day 2 9 , follow course mitoxantrone cytarabine arm I ( 5 course chemotherapy total ) . Patients follow least 1 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 2,000 patient accrue study 5 year .
